Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43907 affecting package optipng for versions less than 0.7.8-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-43907 affecting package optipng for versions less than 0.7.8-5. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package optipng is earlier than 0.7.8-5, affected by CVE-2023-43907
